instruction: Create a Gantt chart to visualize the timeline of a project.
input: The project includes researching and writing a 10,000-word paper due in 5 weeks.
output:
Date             | Task 
---------------- | ----------------
Week 1           | Research 
Week 2           | Research 
Week 3           | Writing 
Week 4           | Writing 
Week 5           | Revising, Editing 
Week 6           | Final Proofing and Submission
